name: The adventures of Tiletown
description:
A small adventure game that was made for MiniJam 116. This game was made in just two days and is not completed yet. It only shows the idea we had for making a game with the limitation "Tile based movement".

The code can be found in Github repository https://github.com/M2110/20220930_GameJam

Used character sprites by Johannes Sjölund (j.sjolund@gmail.com) and Pixel Art Top Down - Basic Tileset by Chainos (https://cainos.itch.io/).
